data.eml:eml: On the taxonomy of Lygosoma bampfyldei Bartlett, 1895 (Squamata: Scincidae) with descriptions of new species from Borneo and Peninsular Malaysia and the resurrection of Lygosoma schneideri Werner, 1900

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grismer, L. Lee, Quah, Evan S. H., Duzulkafly, Zaharil, Yambun, Paul (2018): On the taxonomy of Lygosoma bampfyldei Bartlett, 1895 (Squamata: Scincidae) with descriptions of new species from Borneo and Peninsular Malaysia and the resurrection of Lygosoma schneideri Werner, 1900. Zootaxa 4438 (3): 528-550, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4438.3.6
